title: Lumion 4.0.2 - LM Easy Crack
description:
Act-3D announced new version real-time architectural visualization Lumion 4.0 software, with new motion graphics animation of text and objects, improved grass that sways in the wind, support for importing native SketchUp files, improved motion blur, better oceans, falling leaves and more.

The introduction of Lumion in 2010 changed the concept of architectural rendering. Since then AEC professionals have experienced for themselves why 3D expertise is no longer needed to create compelling visualization videos. Version 4.0 of Lumion takes things to a whole new level and yet builds on its well-known usability, quality and world-beating speed.


1. Instal Lumion 4.0.2 (Lumion_4_0_2_LUM4PRO_EliteSoft Europe.exe)
2. Run Registry.msi in Crack folder
3. Edit host file (c:windowssystem32driversetc). Add these 2 lines: 127.0.0.1 backup.lumion3d.net and 127.0.0.1 license.lumion3d.net
4. Copy Crack folder "Channels" to Lumion 4.0.2 installation folder
5. Enjoy!
